column5: Heading to herridge lake lodge in 9 days.   Can't wait. Gear is gathered and ready to pack. Lol.   I've searched this place in posts but if anyone has anything to share that would be great.  Post report when I return
Ive heard its a tough fish, especially for lakers.  Bass should keep you busy at least and there is plenty of small lakes close by worth checking out.
I plan on giving it a go for lakers but was hoping to get into some good walleye and pike
